edu.cmu.andrew.areyes.scrabble.core.tiles

Class AbstractTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.andrew.areyes.scrabble.core.tiles.AbstractTile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbilityTile, LetterBombTile, LoseWordTile, NegativePointTile, NormalTile, StealWordTile

    public abstract class AbstractTile
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains all information of any given tile on the scrabble board.
    Author:
    Aaron Reyes

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(Location loc)
        This method allows for Game class to set the location of a tile once it is taken from the player's hand and placed on the board.
        Parameters:
        loc - - the location this tile will be placed

      • doAbility

        public abstract int doAbility(java.util.List<Player> players,
            int score)
        Abstract method for a given tile to perform its special ability on the the Players in the Game with the final move score. This ability is limited to changing the overall score of the move. A given tile can take the move's score and change it to whatever it wants and then change the score of any given player's score by any amount desired.
        Parameters:
        players - - the list of Players
        score - - the current score of the move or final score of the move
        Returns:
        the changed score of the move, if applicable
